documents.document: Lol my sister still has my Danish cellphone number and got confused when I wasn't answering her calls
You can tell my friends are all pols majors bc our group chat is just discussing the election date announcement
I always forget how rude the Auckland bus drivers are tbh
Someone remind me I have lesson plans to write and can't completely slack off this weekend please
@katiealicemc $35 up to Auckland is fantastic tbh thanks Jetstar
What I've learnt recently: if you're a student and flying Air NZ, there's a 90% chance your parents paid for your flights
Haven't been this excited for a concert in years whoops
Hey does anyone who has been to @PanicAtTheDisco's Aussie shows remember any setlist highlights?? ❤️❤️
alarum is still my favourite word
@PINKYFANG keen to be involved tbh, having to walk past them into and out of hospital last year was the fucking worst
I asked my flatmate to motivate me to get out of bed and his response was to come into my room and throw pillows at me
This is legitimately terrifying
Heartbreaking post from my friend who's a mum of two. Never been into politics. Is scared of what the future holds for her two boys.
It's nice to teach the kids & get away from everything for a while, but then you get back to everything & realise they're inheriting this
@donttrythis we're not joking mate. Punch the nazis.
Okay so i've been offered another shift and i want money but I don't know if i should whoops
I honestly love my bed so much
Jesus Christ what the fuck is going on at the moment
Hey guys, does anyone know of any organisations in the Wellington region that offer tutoring for refugee kids? #doublethequota
Almost home time thank god
I also have bruises from my strapping tape and having to not wear it every day is a blessing.
I've officially finished preliminary training and I've got my first sole charge class in 48 hours 😮🏊👍
Thread https://t.co/2yXagtwnqn
2 hours, I can smash this out in that amount of time
Okay my plan for the afternoon is find some cheap food, and then head into the library to write this damn assignment
It's so quiet out in the suburbs and I definitely don't like it
Last training day, and I'm 90% exhausted and 10% hungry.
Lesson plans can wait till Monday
Tomorrow's plan is work then meetings, and to spend the 3 hour break between to get a decent draft of the assignment done
Tonight's is gorgeous orange and pink
Wellington has the most beautifully coloured sunsets
My flatmates are going to a BYO and I'm going to bed at 8pm what am I doing with my life
Best thing about working Mondays and Fridays, I get some sweet holiday pay deals
I need my damn class lists ugh
Although I'm going to miss this set of kids, and I won't be teaching any of them next term 😢
As much as I like the train, I'm looking forward to only having to do this 3 times a week instead of 7
Why do media outlets insist on asking these ridiculous questions please stop giving these literal Nazi's room to sp… https://t.co/mVmrMEL9Iu
"this is the one where he puts his dick on the fuckin dank shit"
it's only a 1000 word assignment, it'll be sweet
okay i left the room for 2 minutes and we're into weird youtube territory
I just wrote "chapter 2, the 2nd chapter". I'm done for the night.
flatmate just started her new job & her story today is "someone played an 8 hour whale song" & the company got a memo on professionalism
"FUCK YOU WE'RE WATCHING THE GOAT PARODY"
Okay the flatmate is now playing Lonely Island and writing this is going nowhere
the challenge is to see if i can write this on the train to and from work in the next 2 days
today has been work, theory training, drills training, and now assignments. tired.
Lol I forgot he was a trump supporter. Lol. Another reason I don't support him or his followers.
My breakfast is telling me to man up
I'm going to get the 8.20 train today, can't be bothered hanging around at the pool for an hour beforehand
I mean I adore work but right now I'm absolutely exhausted
It's taking so much effort not to crawl back into bed right now
This guy talks like a D- essay written an hour before the deadline
Screw this im taking the 8.20 train I don't want to be waiting around in this weather
Also the storm has definitely hit again so that's something
Only one shift in the pool today, and then back into uni and tutorials. And then old job this evening. Long day.
Just one wrist today.
Time for the now daily icepack ritual
90% sure there's an allergic reaction to the strapping tape I'm using yay
@precariatqueer hey @JosephPagani it's u
@JosephPagani even if browsing memes is your version of productivity
@JosephPagani nope. I need something that's actually productive.
@collettgracel piss oooooooooooooooffffff I want a break
Fark I need a haircut
So I cut a hole in my pants while trying to strap my wrist and that pretty much sums up what I'm like in mornings
I thought work had me back on a reasonable sleep schedule but here I am, not asleep, again.
I grew up w/ Obama tho: too young to remember the Bush administration
The phrase "someday, there will be a black president" was weird to these people
Watching a show filmed in my childhood is very very different though
Rewatching House for the third or fourth time and it's still reasonably enjoyable tbh
@nytimes Yes. Yes it is.
I need a hobby that I can take up on the train to and from work
I have to get on a train in 10 hours and I'm less than excited
@RichardBSpencer you're a nazi who got punched in the face lol
I mean it's almost 6 and I've already done stuff but still
I have tea and television my day off is sorted
Someone's looking out for me, training isn't interfering with my claaaaaasses!!
Since when have I been so uneasy about late nights this is definitely not me
I feel very uneasy tonight and I'm not sure why at all
It's very nice to not have to set my alarm for 6am tomorrow
She's just always so full of life and words and it's nice
I'm so so glad I meant Dayna honestly that girl is a light in my life and I'm so glad she lives with me
Honestly my wrists have been fine for ages why do they have to play up this week of all weeks
It's only a week or so into work and the chlorine is already screwing with my blonde
@katiealicemc I'm not talking like Alvin and the Chipmunks level, just at like 135% speed
Pro tip: if you ever want a laugh, just listen to sped up versions of 80's hits. Works every time.
@katiealicemc but it doesn't mean we can cancel the discussion on how exclusionary and inaccessible some forms of feminism are
Don't get me wrong, these marches are fantastic and wonderful and a sign that some things are right in the world
Also if first wave feminists could stop basing speeches on sex-shaming and denial of sexuality that'd be great ❤️
Friendly reminder that you can't expect people to respect your "feminism" when it doesn't respect their identity #transrightsarehumanrights
This weekend has been tiring for everyone
Super thankful for an actual day off tomorrow and a chance to catch up on course work and training stuff
Honestly there's a time and place for confrontational interaction and dealing with literal Nazi's is that time and place
Well I was exhausted at 8pm and now it's 11pm and the flat has a flute, guitar, and a tenor horn out
Also swimming and manoeuvring kids around is hard okay
I'm definitely not used to having a job where I'm active all day
This next week is ridiculously stupidly busy whoops
Also I'm unrealistically excited at the return of Stephen Colbert on Stephen Colbert's Late Night with Stephen Colbert
Trevor Noah crying over Bernie Sanders is my current vibe
